attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is self explanatory.

Every one knows that this prime minister is past his sell by date.

He "lied" to get us into war in Iraq and has hence made the world less stable with more terrorism not less. He is "responsible" for hundreds of thousands of deaths in Iraq.

He is bringing in "Big Brother" society in this country in the guise of anti-terrorism, road charging etc.

Etc, etc and etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
